location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morier and Henry Ellis, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting that the Resident make arrangements for the transportation of a British detachment, which has been in service with the Persian Army, to India; the detachment is expected to arrive at Bushire during March 1815. A list of persons requiring passage is enclosed.
